articles.author: By Lilit Marcus, CNN
articles.title: What it's like to eat at Asia's best restaurant - CNN
articles.description: Den in Tokyo was given top honors by the World's 50 Best group, recognizing it as the best restaurant in Asia.
articles.content:
(CNN) Tuesday night, Den in Tokyo was given top honors by the World's 50 Best group, recognizing it as the best restaurant in Asia.
Den is no stranger to accolades. It has two Michelin stars and has… [+2219 chars]

articles.title: Ed Sheeran, Camila Cabello perform at fundraising concert for Ukraine - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: Organisers said the concert had raised £12.2 million (US$16 million) which will be donated to the Disasters Emergency Committee – an umbrella of British charities – for the humanitarian appeal in Ukraine.
articles.content:
Chart-toppers Ed Sheeran and Camila Cabello were among music stars who took to the stage on Tuesday (Mar 29) night at a televised concert aiming to raise funds for a Ukrainian humanitarian appeal.

articles.title: Actress Jaime Teo to undergo surgery after breaking collarbone in a cycling accident - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: She was trying to overtake a big group of cyclists at Marina Bay Sands when the accident happened.
articles.content:

articles.title: Hong Kong February home prices drop to 13-month low, hit by new COVID-19 wave - CNA
articles.description:
HONG KONG: Hong Kong private home prices dropped at a faster pace in February to their lowest since January 2021, official data showed on Tuesday (Mar 29), as the Asian financial hub was hit by a new wave of COVID-19 infections.

articles.title: How Bad Inflation Might Get, According To The Companies That Will Raise Prices - Forbes
